title: More radio appearances from the members of Radiohead
body:
Wednesday (tonight)
Philip will be on air tonight, as special guest on John Kennedy's XFM show from 10pm UK time
http://www.xfm.co.uk/onair/shows/xposure

Thursday (tomorrow)
Ed will appear on Steve Lamacq's Roundtable show, as a panel guest, 6pm UK time
http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b015tyhz

Sunday (sunday)
Thom has recorded a mix for 6music which airs this Sunday evening at 8pm UK time
http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b0162gs5
